movies.title: Alabaster
movies.plot: Alabaster is the story of a man walking the road to forgiveness. Ethan, a small-time criminal with no family or friends, wakes up one day to find a mysterious invitation. For reasons unknown to even himself, he starts on the long path to Alabaster. Along the way Ethan meets an interesting cast of characters who each in there own way shed light on his troubled past, forcing him to take responsibility for what he has done and the people he has hurt. Just when the end is in sight Ethan begins to realize where this journey might end and the truth behind this magical place of Alabaster. But is he ready for redemption?
movies.simplePlot: Alabaster is the story of a man walking the road to forgiveness. Ethan, a small-time criminal with no family or friends, wakes up one day to find a mysterious invitation. For reasons ...

biography.bio: Courtney Alexander is an actor, known for How to Succeed with Women (2012) and Alabaster (2007).
biography.name: Courtney Alexander

biography.bio: Aaron Beelner was born on June 21, 1974 in Remsen, Iowa, USA. He is known for his work on Slaw (2016), The Little Tin Man (2013) and Crackerjack (2013).
biography.name: Aaron Beelner

biography.bio: Daniel Burnley was born on July 29, 1956 in Georgia, USA. He was an actor, known for Footloose (2011), Return of the Sandman (2009) and The Bread Squeezer (2006). He died on October 25, 2013 in Atlanta, Georgia.
biography.name: Daniel Burnley

biography.bio: Anna House is an actress, known for Lawless (2012), Ride Along (2014) and Bleed (2016).
biography.name: Anna House

biography.bio: Carrie Rose started working in the business at the age of 5. Emerging as a top child model, she traveled and booked numerous campaigns and commercials with many top clients, such as American Girl and Hallmark. After the urging of her agent, she began acting at age 10. She remained under the careful management of Sharon Lane, of Lane Management, until entering USC School of Cinematic Arts for Film Production in 2009. During her high school years she acted in several indie films and focused on school and theater. She developed a love of fine art and film and began working as an intern for Dolphin Entertainment. She is currently a freshman, on the Dean's List, for the 2009/2010 school year. She continues with her love of acting, art, producing, and film development.
biography.name: Carrie-Rose Menocal

biography.bio: Bill Pacer is a mature, open minded, and versatile producer, writer and SAG/AFTRA actor. In addition, he has worked as a casting director and location scout. Bill has an unlimited perspective of life, and savors every breath and breathes boldly. Will Go Far, LLC, which Bill co-owns with LaDonna Allison, epitomizes Bill's exciting reality as they have solo shows about Ben Franklin, Mrs. Ben Franklin, and others. And Will Go Far goes farther than simply G-rated shows. They strive to eschew social stigmas and question artificial barriers. Known as Barefoot Bill Pacer due to his aversion to shoes, he strolls through life with joy and candor. He loves the stage, film, television, and modeling. Bill has a multifarious background and desire. He yearns for variety and challenge. His work spans concepts from kids to controversial, horror to humorous, silly to sad. The quintessential character actor, his interpretations are dynamic and exciting. While his signature roles are Scrooge and Ben Franklin, his true signature is the ability to bring life to different and diverse individuals. He perceives every casting as an entreaty to absorb all information possible to mold the character. Creating compelling individuals is a hallmark of Bill's dedication. Bill made his television debut on Romper Room in 1954 on WAAM-TV (now WJZ-TV) in Baltimore. Since then, he has enjoyed the theatrical. Described as uninhibited, eccentric, eclectic, exuberant and unique, Bill defies classification. He says, "The boundaries of the character are more essential than my personal boundaries."
biography.name: Bill Pacer

biography.bio: John Roach is an actor, known for Grilling Bobby Hicks (2009), The Green Room (2007) and Lynch Mob (2009).
biography.name: John Roach

biography.bio: Anthony Samples was born on August 15, 1966 in Atlanta, Georgia, USA. He is known for his work on Zombieland (2009), Terror at Tate Manor (2002) and Alabaster (2007).
biography.name: Anthony Samples

biography.bio: Josh Tyson is known for his work on No Retreat (2016), The First Day (2012) and Law & Order (1990).
biography.name: Josh Tyson

biography.bio: Billy Wilkerson was born on April 25, 1982 in Indiana, USA. He is a writer and actor, known for The Incredible Happenings of Avery Goodman (2007), That's Magic! (2008) and Alabaster (2007).
biography.name: Billy Wilkerson
